definition: something or someone that causes trouble, to cause annoyance in
details:
noun
- something or someone that causes trouble
= synonyms: annoyance
- an angry disturbance
= synonyms: fuss
verb
- to cause annoyance in
= example: to cause annoyance in
= synonyms: rag
- to make confused, perplexed, or puzzled
= example: to make confused, perplexed, or puzzled
- to make nervous or agitated
= example: to make nervous or agitated
- to intrude or enter uninvited
= example: to intrude or enter uninvited
- to take the trouble to do something
= example: to take the trouble to do something
= synonyms: trouble
- to cause inconvenience or discomfort to
= example: to cause inconvenience or discomfort to
= synonyms: inconvenience
